title: [Luukos' Gullet, Wide Ledge]
description: By the standards of the "path" below, this ledge is a vast expanse of land stretching a luxurious ten feet in either direction.  The heat of the fiery cauldron still brings sweat to the brow, and the fumes choke anyone fool enough to stand.  With a start, you notice a huge stone snake head staring at you.
